coded_answer.p: Thank you for your letter. I have just received the letter from you. I am really pleased that I have won first prize in your competition at Camp California in the U.S.A.

I would like to travel in July this year because I think the weather will be nice and I can take a holiday. I would like to use a tent for my accommodation. I think it is more interesting than a log cabinscabin. I can be more nextclosecloser to nuturenature and I have never used tents before. It seems to be exciting.

I choose swimming and painting for my activities while I am at the Camp. I really like swimming. When I was a child, I used to go swimming with my family at the weekend, having a chat, making a barbecue, playing games. It was such a good time. I enjoy painting as well. My mother told me that I'm good at painting. When I was in high school, I won second prize in a painting competition. My parents were very proundproud of me.
Could I ask you some questions? I would like to know whichwhat kind of clothes I should bring to the camp. How much money should I bring there and can I use my credit card at the camp?
I look forward to hearing from you.
